function.name: search_sources
function.description: Retrieve sources from the Azure AI Search index

search_query.description: Query string to retrieve documents from azure search eg: 'Health care plan'

function.name: send_email
function.description: Send the current chat history as an email to the user

to_email.description: The email address to send the chat history to

subject.description: The subject line of the email

introduction.description: A brief introduction to the chat history that will appear at the top of the email

function.name: add_note
function.description: Save a new note to the user's OneNote default notebook using Microsoft Graph.

title.description: The title of the OneNote page, which should be reflective of the recent conversation history.

intro_content.description: Any additional content to be added to the OneNote page. The system will always add the chat history to the page after this content.
